snippet: The owner of La Pecora Bianca lives in a one-bedroom in a Greek Revival townhouse within walking distance of his Italian farmhouse restaurant.
abstract: Former NBA executive-turned-restaurateur Mark Barak loves his one-bedroom apartment in Greenwich Village Greek Revival townhouse, which he has filled with flea market souvenirs bringing visceral memories of his years living in Europe.
lead_paragraph: The owner of La Pecora Bianca lives in a one-bedroom in a Greek Revival townhouse within walking distance of his Italian farmhouse restaurant.

headline.main: Restaurateur Mark Barak’s Home as an Elegant Scrapbook
